K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-0: @214b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-1: aom dzny'a n'a ba lo ki te sa manta spha
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-2: ra na rashmi bha ba sa ma ya ma h'a
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-3: ma ni du ru du ru hri da ya dza
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-4: la ni h'um/ 'bab chu'am mtsho'i 'gram du 'dug ste
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-5: lag pa g-yas pa'i 'khyor bar chu blugs la ye
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-6: shes skar mda'i snying po 'di lan bdun bzlas te
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-7: chu khyor ba bdun 'bab chur gtor na /
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-8: sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i yi dvags ji
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-9: snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lha'i kha zas
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-10: kyi ro dang / btung ba'i ro mchog dang ldan pa 'thob cing /
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-11: yi dvags re re yang kha zas dang /
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-12: btung ba yul ma ga dha'i bre bdun bdun gyis
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-13: 'tsho bar byas par 'gyur zhing; chu de 'thungs ba
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-14: tsam gyis de dag thams cad yi dvags kyi skye
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-16: bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:214b-21: gzhan yang byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa yi dvags sam /
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:215a-0: chu la gnas pa la sogs pa @215a *//
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:215a-1: gang gis chu de 'thungs pa re dag thams cad sdig pa dang /
K12D0649=D1077_H0643:215a-2: sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
